title: Episode #20: Freemasonry and Manhood In American History with Robert Davis
description: Welcome back to another episode of the Art of Manliness podcast. In this edition, we talk to Robert Davis about the history of masculinity in America and Freemasonry's influence on American men. Robert is the Executive Secretary of the Guthrie, Oklahoma Scottish Rite and the author of the book Understanding American Manhood: Freemasonry's Enduring Path to the Mature Masculine.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
